title: Dragon Simulator Multiplayer
fullContent: Home› DragonDragon Simulator MultiplayerBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDragon Simulator Multiplayer is the type of game that allows you feel the thrill of flight as you spread your dragon wings above the buildings. Let the fireballs hit the enemies and experience the fantasy of being in the Dragons world.If you want to enter Dragon Simulator Multiplayer you must select a dragon first. • Soteonth The Warrior• Fyminth The Chosen (available at level 10)• Gossalo Eater of Sheep (available at level 20)• Piessierth The Eternal One (available at level 30)• Marvolth The White One (available at level 40)After choosing the Dragon, you will need to find a room to join a battle or to create one.Available modes:• DM• TDM• Battle Royale Levels:• Wastesland• RedWaste• WasteTwonSelect the maximum players that can join and the type of room can be private/night.You also have the chance to play the Battle Royale that has a rating of 1500.Dragon Profile details:• Level • Xp • Kills • Money • Buy Gift Dont forget to collect the daily gift reward !Dragon Simulator Multiplayer Display:• Kill feed (displayed on the top left)• Controls (displayed on the  left & right bottom )• City Map & HP  (displayed on the top right)ControlsWASD or arrow keys: moveSpace: fly upL Shift: sprintQ: jumpC: downR: dodgeShift + Left mouse click: fire breathLeft mouse click: fireballRight mouse click: melee attackT: chatM: mapEsc: pause menu This article was updated on November 21, 20233DActionAdventureAnimalBattleBattle RoyaleDragonFantasyFlyingFreeMultiplayerSimulator
